description:
Atsushi and Akutagawa fail to call off the Moby Dick`s descent. They search desperately for other ways to protect Yokohama.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If I May Shed Away My Burden Now
Moshi Kyou Kono Nimotsu o Oroshite Ii no nara
Se solo ora potessi liberarmi del mio fardello
Si je peux enfin me débarrasser de ce fardeau
Wenn ich heute diese Last ablegen darf
若し今日この荷物を降ろして善いのなら
